name: Revenge of Anubis
description: The Story: Return to Ancient Egypt and play as the God of the Dead Anubis. The Great Pyramid and the Sphinx has been seized by Set, God of disorder and Sobek, ruler of the Nile. It is up to you to find your way into the pyramid, defeat Set and his horde of faithful creatures. Then find the key to Sobek's underground lair, and restore peace across the land.
